segments.text: Could you do something to advance your time of shipment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , our manufacturers are fully committed at the moment . I'm afraid it's very difficult to improve any further on the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you'll try to convince them to step up production .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We check their production schedule against our orders almost every day . As new orders keep coming in , they are working three shifts to step up production . I'm sorry , but we simply cannot commit ourselves beyond what the production schedule can fulfill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , in that case , there is nothing more to be said . What's your last word as to the date then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I said by the middle of October . This is the best we can promise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I'll take you at your word . May I suggest that you put down in the contract shipment on October 15th or earlier ? Our letter of credit will be opened early September .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Let's call it a deal . We'll do our best to advance the shipment to September . The chances are that some of the other orders may be cancelled . But of course you cannot count on that . In any case , we'll let you know by email .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's very considerate of you . And now , shall we discuss the insurance terms ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We generally insure W . P . ( W . P . A ) on a C . I . F . offer . Special risks , such as TEND ( Theft , Pilferage and Non-delivery ) , leakage , breakage , oil , freshwater , etc . can also be covered upon request .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I suppose the additional premium for the special coverage is for the buyer's account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Quite right . According to the usual practice in international trade , special risks are not covered unless the buyer asks for them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then what about SICC ( Strikes , Riots and Civil Commotions ) ? Can we request you to cover this for our imports ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we accept it now , after it has been suspended for many years . However , if you want to have it covered for your imports at your end , you may arrange the insurance as you like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then please cover W . P . A . and TEND for this transaction .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , I'll adjust the price accordingly .
segments.speaker: S2
